content:
000594e6efd94c5ea6203:
  'description': Describes the process of setting up a meeting at a specific
    date and time.
  'name': Schedule Meeting
  'attribute':
  - 'slot_description': The date for the scheduled meeting.
    'id': a050ddead58a47e5ba25d
    'slot_name': date
  - 'slot_description': The time for the scheduled meeting.
    'id': d284c3811a124dd785676
    'slot_name': time
  - 'slot_description': The duration of the scheduled meeting.
    'id': 0e334d04518141c2a28a7
    'slot_name': duration
  - 'slot_description': The topic of the scheduled meeting.
    'id': 92fca67208ff494785d0b
    'slot_name': topic
  - 'slot_description': The participants invited to the scheduled meeting.
    'id': e8b09ca55b36404ab8409
    'slot_name': participants
239a773eeb834b2da3687:
  'description': Provides troubleshooting steps for resolving audio-related
    problems during a call.
  'name': Audio Issues
  'attribute':
  - 'slot_description': The audio problem being experienced during a Zoom meeting.
    'id': 791a8028eb8e49baad592
    'slot_name': problem
  - 'slot_description': Possible solutions to the audio problem.
    'id': 7408544d05724d5a99ce4
    'slot_name': solution
63f1abc1d6b34a6cb1900:
  'description': Describes unexpected behavior or errors in specific applications.
  'name': App Malfunctions
  'attribute':
  - 'slot_description': The name of the mobile application experiencing issues.
    'id': 9eac1f8cbf7e4c799f2fd
    'slot_name': app_name
    'slot_examples':
    - Facebook
    - Instagram
    - WhatsApp
    - Gmail
    - YouTube
    - Snapchat
  - 'slot_description': The type of problem or malfunction occurring in the app.
    'id': 568a3825add6470288ec6
    'slot_name': issue_type
  - 'slot_description': The mobile operating system the app is installed on.
    'id': 52a5ae4364994b7cadab8
    'slot_name': mobile_platform
b310cfc4e0884138b8644:
  'description': Details how to request permission to control another user's
    screen in a meeting.
  'name': Request Control
  'attribute':
  - 'slot_description': The role of the user in the meeting.
    'id': 7d6ddf255fb84aa997ae5
    'slot_name': user_role
  - 'slot_description': The name of the participant to request control from.
    'id': 761c6693d56b4ff8ab493
    'slot_name': participant_name
    'slot_examples':
    - John Doe
    - Jane Smith
    - Mike Johnson

As a scheduling assistant, you should assist users with various tasks including troubleshooting issues during a meeting. When given a user reequest, first match the request to the correct ID (randomized alphanumeric code) based on the descriptions provided in the YAML above. If the user request is matched with an ID based on the description, return a List of Dictionaries in YAML that includes the ID as a key and extract the attribute slot values associated. IF no ID can be matched to the user request based on the description, return a JSON list of dictionaries with an output of "NULL" under ID, attribute slot ID and slot value.

"Hey there. I cannot seem to share my screen during my Skype call. I am not sure if it is my laptop or the application itself, but nothing is happening when I press the button. Is there a meeting setting that I need to change? Any steps to troubleshoot would be much appreciated!" 
The sentences above in quotations are the customer request to be analyzed.

rejected:
ID: b310cfc4e0884138b8644
attributes:
    user_role: NULL
    participant_name: NULL
